description:
Doumoto Kuzuha is the representative of Class B. She is actually of elementary school age, but was accelerated to high school at Babel because of her exceptional intelligence and skill. She initially disliked Akatsuki, but after he helped her regain confidence after she had been looked down upon by the rest of the student council, they became good friends. She is also close friends to Chikage and Miu.
She specialises in earth magic and her AD takes the form of a giant warhammer.
name: Doumoto Kuzuha
